title: Topic 001 Question 035
body: You are a member of the security team at an organization. Your team has a single GCP project with credit card payment processing systems alongside web applications and data processing systems. You want to reduce the scope of systems subject to PCI audit standards.
options: Use multi-factor authentication for admin access to the web application.
Use only applications certified compliant with PA-DSS.
Move the cardholder data environment into a separate GCP project.
Use VPN for all connections between your office and cloud environments.
